EmbeddedConnectionConfiguration

class EmbeddedConnectionConfiguration(val posConnectionType: PosConnectionType?, val listener: Any, val supportsOfflineMode: Boolean, val shouldActivateWithExpandedLocation: Boolean = true) : ConnectionConfiguration

The EmbeddedConnectionConfiguration object should be used to connect to an embedded reader

val failIfInUse: Boolean
